item.title: Publishing-Taxonomies-in-Information-Science
item.description:
Several of my publications in Information Science have publisher-centric schemes for categorizing the topics of the would-be published work. I wonder if anyone has done a congurency or equivalency analysis of these publisher centeric schemes.

Several that I can think of right now are:

  • The ALISE Research Taxonomy https://www.alise.org/research-taxonomy-
  • The IEEE Taxonomy https://www.ieee.org/content/dam/ieee-org/ieee/web/org/pubs/ieee-taxonomy.pdf; https://www.ieee.org/publications/services/thesaurus-thank-you.html
  • ACM Computing Classification System https://dl.acm.org/ccs
  • Library of Congress Subject Headings https://id.loc.gov/authorities/subjects.html
